attributes.action: change law so burgulars cant sue for injury when entering your property
attributes.additional_details: It's time the law was changed so that home owners, private tenants and social housing tenants can legally put up anti climb paint, barbed wire, glass etc anything that will deter a burgular from entering the place you call home. A place that you should feel safe without the scum trying to sue you for injury when they are in the wrong in the first place by trespassing.
